description:
Beauty Booth, 4 million downloads 

* Beauty Booth is a universal photo app with optimized user interfaces for both iPad and iPhone/iPod Touch devices! 
* Video Review : http://bit.ly/beautybooth

Discover the nature beauty of your face with Beauty Booth’s magic touch. 
Beauty Booth is the science everyone wanted; it brings life and shine to your moments! 

The eyes and the skin are the parts of a human body that appeal the most. You won’t argue how important the role of the eyes when it comes to attracting others. Beauty Booth brings life to your eyes making them the key attraction of your photos. You will also be able to use the filter effect that automatically analyses and optimizes the tone of your skin according to the surrounding environments. Of course acne, scars and freckles on your face will disappear perfectly!

One more thing, we offer you a lot of cool emoticons and speech bubbles you can use for the make-over. Beauty Booth helps you find the beauty inside you! 

Recommended to those who say:
- To be honest, I am much better looking. Photo science needs improvement. 
- I want my face to shine splendidly. 
- My dark circles look awful and ever bigger in the pictures.
- I miss my clean face without acne, freckles!  
- How come I look this old in the pictures?
- I desperately need a cool Facebook profile pic! 
- A nice profile pic will help me date someone! 

Don’t miss this great opportunity. Find the beauty inside you and spread it to your Facebook and Instagram networks. Beauty Booth will make you a way to the beauty you’ve always wanted. You will definitely praise its quality! 

◆ Special features 

- Powerful shooting feature 
- Sharing feature to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, KakaoTalk etc 
- Automatic analysis of the eyes and skin tones and effect recommendation feature 
- 20 attractive-eyes-effects
- Location and size control of the eyes
- 26 beauty-filter-effects and real-time count control
- Skin Smoothing and skin tone correction
- Deco Shop : Hundreds of stamps and speech bubbles
- Making a stamp with your photo 
- 34 stylish photo borders
- Adjust border roundness and thickness
- Compare with an original photo

[Notice]
iOS 6 requires turning ON in “iPhone’s Settings – Privacy – Photos - Beauty Booth” in order to save photos to Camera Roll.

We are waiting for your feedback :) Thank you!

Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/BeautyBoothApp
Email: contact@jellybus.com 
Homepage : http://www.jellybus.com
